body:
Herrow, I'm back from my 3 week long vacation at the east coast.... barely outran Hurricane Arthur to get home. :P It's good to have a vacation, but now I don't really have a clue what's going on at Avicus.....
Could you guys fill me in on what happened(important stuff)
so far, I've seen one new rule, a ton of upgraded jr. mods(gratz, yey!) and some staff who quit D:

Some key things I want to know about:
1.Has the player count increased?
2.Is spawnkilling still allowed in nexus?
3.What was the name of the map updates from Para and Evo?(So i can search it up :))(link would be good too)
thats about it :)

thanx :)

title: Back from vacation ;)

2. No, it isn't allowed

AviGill is moving house so he don't have internet. He luckly had some to post this post but he will be inactive for some weeks.
